content.rendered:
Balconies      Gates      Railings      Handrails      Staircases & Balustrades

Balconies
Gates
Railings
Handrails
Staircases & Balustrades

Big Ferro create a wide range of metal gates to meet every need. Our Gates are handcrafted and designed in the UK by skilled Italian metalwork specialists. Whether you are looking for a stunning, high-impact design for a residential property, or a made to measure, secure structure for an industrial property, we will be able to create a metal gate that works for you. We believe in quality, for this reason, we only use the finest materials to guarantee the durability of our products.

Pedestrian gates are a popular choice for homes in and around London. They serve both an aesthetic and functional purpose and are a great way of keeping intruders out. You have the choice to add a protective sheeted metal layer behind your gate for an added layer of security. You can see some examples below. Our gates and made to measure, contact a member of our team today to book a free onsite visit.

Double gates or driveway gates are great for creating curb appeal and making your home look more appealing to potential buyers. They act as a deterrent to intruders as well as adding a layer of privacy to your home. You can opt for a manual or automatic gate option, speak to a member of our team to find out what option works best for you. 

Sliding gates – We design, build and modify metal sliding gates for the commercial and residential sectors. The sliding gate will fit the full length of the driveway. We offer a bespoke, made to measure service and will ensure the sliding mechanism is best suited to the driveway level. We will use either a tracked mechanism or cantilever opening, depending on the design.

Side Gates, Garden Gates & Alleyway Gates – Our made to measure gates are a perfect option for making your home look neat as well as securing your premises. Take a look at our gates below. A member of our team will survey the site and take the correct measurements before fabricating.

Big Ferro Creations Showcase gallery

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

As well as creating made to measure gates at affordable prices, we also offer a mobile welding and repair service. This may be a more suitable option than replacing your metal gates.

Our gates are customizable to serve a range of needs and projects, for the residential, commercial and industrial sectors. Our collection of gates include, but are not limited to: pedestrian gates, alleyway gates, driveway gates, automatic gates, electric gates, side gates, slide gates, expandable gates, composite gates, bi-folding gates and more.

We specialise in both manual and automatic gates, and our electric gates are an excellent choice for both residential and industrial properties. We also use a variety of construction techniques depending on your needs, from gorgeous wrought iron designs, to practical sheet metal.

We offer a powder coating service to help create a protective finish that is low in toxicity and has low flammability. Powder coating your metal gates will help with the longevity of your products. As our products are completely bespoke, you have the option to design your Gates from scratch.
